name: Le Plaisir
description:
The goal of the game is to litterally roll the die and beat a certain score to go to the next level. By rolling on green tiles, the value of the die is added to your score, but on red tiles, the value is substracted from your score. If you get stuck or have no tile left to roll on, you have lost. Good luck !

Use the arrow keys to move the die.

Known bug:

  • Depending on your screen refresh rate, the game might be slower.
  • Do not attempt to move the die when the level is changing, it will break the game.
